title: The Moment Has Moved
description:
Can’t get enough of The Moment? For more stories about romance, relationships, and the unexpected twists of dating, listen ad-free on Wondery+ now.

For a limited time, we are offering The Moment listeners a free week of Wondery+. Just go to wonderyplus.com/themoment.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
